title: I built the cutest gaming setup
description: Try Rocket Money for free:    Check out Ridges Fathers Day sale at  and enjoy up to 40% off!  Cute is more than style - its a way of life. Its not just a gaming PC, nor is it using every shade of pink and its certainly not just squishing every plushie you own onto a desk. There is a careful balance of the right parts and peripherals, and we aim to make our prettiest setup EVER!  Discuss on the forum:   Check out the KAWAIIIII products used in this video:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
